name: bind-standard
description: BIND (Business Insurance Normalized Data) â€” An open data interoperability standard for insurance.

scripts.gen: pnpm run gen:schema && pnpm run gen:docs
scripts.docs:dev: pnpm run gen && vitepress dev site
scripts.docs:build: pnpm run gen && vitepress build site
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist schemas/resources schemas/supporting schemas/index.json site/resources site/data-types site/public/schema site/.vitepress/dist site/.vitepress/cache
scripts.deploy: pnpm run wrangler:config && pnpm exec wrangler deploy
